description: Jesus standing at right with head bend, hands in prayer; John the Baptist standing at center, holding a tall cross, pouring water from his PR hand; winged cherub heads in ULC and dove; lamb and standing figures including a boy at right
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash
provenance: William Lygon, 8th Earl Beauchamp (1903-1979). Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 4, 1985, no. 90, for £3,456.50, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1985-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Baptism of Christ
